meanings.definition: To outdo in preening or grooming.
meanings.sent1: The peacock outpreened the other birds by displaying its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent2: She outpreened her classmates by always looking perfectly groomed.
meanings.sent3: The cat outpreened itself after grooming, feeling proud of its shiny fur.
meanings.sent4: The model outpreened her competitors on the runway with her confident strut.
meanings.sent5: The dog outpreened the other pets at the show with its well-brushed coat.

meanings.definition: To surpass in vanity or self-admiration.
meanings.sent1: He outpreened his friends by constantly talking about his achievements.
meanings.sent2: The actress outpreened her co-stars by always seeking attention.
meanings.sent3: The peacock outpreened itself in the mirror, admiring its own beauty.
meanings.sent4: The politician outpreened his opponents with his grand speeches.
meanings.sent5: The social media influencer outpreened her followers with glamorous selfies.
